overview:
National Sales Director at ThinkBIGSites.com

A native of California and current resident of Arizona, Sandi Parker brings to ThinkBIG over 17 years of business experience with some of the most prolific companies of our time. From her positions with PhillipMorris/Kraft Foods Corporation and Maxwell House to her roles with such financial institutions as Viking Southwest and Progressive Financial, Sandi has honed her unique brand of customer service â€“ always making it a priority that her work exceeded the expectations of her customers and clients.

Sandiâ€™s initiation into the world of online marketing came at the heels of a worldwide business evolution. She saw an opportunity to help businesses achieve success at another level; in a venue that was fast becoming THE stage for local, national, and global competition. And wanting to align herself with the very best company in this growing industry she chose ThinkBIGsites.com, a world-class organization that met her criteria for integrity, honesty, and customer satisfaction.

Today, Sandi works with her clients to understand and appreciate the nuances of online marketing and how even the smallest of steps can yield big rewards. Her clientsâ€™ complete satisfaction is the goal towards which Sandi drivesâ€¦and she never takes her eyes off the road.
